title: Bill Taylor: Putin rewrites centuries of history in questioning Ukraine’s sovereignty
description: William Taylor, former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine and Vice President, Russia & Europe at the U.S. Institute of Peace, talks to Chuck about Ukraine’s history and why Russian President Vladimir Putin’s push to control Ukraine could backfire.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: William Taylor, former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine and Vice President, Russia & Europe at the U.S. Institute of Peace, talks to Chuck about Ukraine’s history and why Russian President Vladimir Putin’s push to control Ukraine could backfire.
